shadow.name: DOMINANCE
shadow.description: Using resources to control, material manipulation
shadow.thought_pattern: If I control the resources, I control the people.

gift.name: GATHERING
gift.description: Attracting resources for the benefit of the collective
gift.somatic_signature: Open hands, receiving and giving flow
gift.thought_pattern: Resources flow to me so they can flow through me.

siddhi.name: COMMUNION
siddhi.description: Recognition that all belongs to all, no separation
siddhi.thought_pattern: There is no mine or yours. All is One.

inversion_protocols.script: You are controlling resources because you don't trust the flow. Gate 45 is about gathering for the collective good, not personal dominance. True leadership comes from distribution, not hoarding. When you hold tight, you block the very flow that sustains you. Open your hands.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Notice where you're gripping (money, objects, power). Physically open your hands. Release the grip.

experiment.hypothesis: If I practice generous distribution for 7 days, more resources will flow to me.
experiment.action: Daily: Give away something of value (money, time, knowledge). Track what comes back.

success_criteria.target: Experience of increased flow and decreased fear
